text: Fakhitah bint Abi Talib, also known as Umm Hani bint Abi Talib (Arabic فاختة بنت أبي طالب), was Muhammad's cousin. Umm Hani was the daughter of Abu Talib. He was a hadith narrator.Muhammad ibn Saad. Kitab al-Tabaqat al-Kabir, vol. 8. Translated by Bewley, A. (1995). The Women of Madina. London: Ta-Ha Publishers. == References == Category:Female Sahabah Category:570s births
title: Fakhitah bint Abi Talib
